GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Mail for Exchange (Exchange ActiveSync)), Excel, Word, Powerpoint, OneNote, Adobe Acrobat Reader, Lync
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Quick Guide, SIM Door Key, Handset, Charger, Data Cable, Headset

Platform.Processor: 1.5 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4, Dual Core

Display.Other Display Features: High Brightness Mode, Pixel Density 332 PPI, Luminance 600 NITS, Multipoint-touch Screen, Brightness Control, Corning Gorilla Glass, RGB Stripe, Sunlight Readability Enhancements, Polarization Filter, Light Time-out, Color Boosting, IPS Screen, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, Sculpted 2.5D Glass

Camera.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus, Touch Focus, Geo-tagging, Auto and Manual White Balance, BSI sensor, Optical Image Stabilization, Lenses Applications, CMOS Sensor, Multi-scene Modes, Carl Zeiss Tessar Lens, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v3, Supported Profiles (A2DP 1.2, AVRCP 1.3, SDAP, SPP 1.0, GAVDP 1.2, GAP, HFP 1.5, PBAP 1.0, HSP 1.1, OPP)

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports 3GPP, H.263, ASF, H.264, WMV 9, AVC, MP4, 3GP, M4V, VC-1, Full HD, HD

Other Features.Important Apps: Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Windows Live Messenger, Hotmail, Yahoo, Outlook Mobile, Gmail, Voice Mail, Instant Messaging, YouTube, Nokia Mail
Other Features.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Magnetometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Gyroscope Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
